page.title: 05The animals at Port Lympne
page.content: Port Lympne is fully open to the public, and visitors can see Black Panther, Tigers, Monkeys, Cheetahs, Snow Leopards, Honey Badger, Eland, Hog Deer, Black Rhino, Tapir,Indian Elephants,Antelope, African Buffalo, Chimpanzees, Stork, Cassowary, American Bison, Clouded Leopards, Wild Boar,Wolves, Emu, Siberian Tigers, Small Cats, Caracal, Serval Cat, Barbary Lions, Water Buffalo and Hyaenas. Animals in this Zoo in greatest danger of extinction are Siberian Tiger, Black Rhino, Water Buffalo, Swamp Deer, and the Przewalski's Wild Horse. At this date the Przewalski Wild Horse numbers just above 300.
